postcontent: The Colt M4A1 SOCOM Carbine was designed specifically for lightweight mobility, speed of target acquisition, and potent firepower capability - the Colt Law Enforcement Carbine delivers. This specially designed law enforcement/military weapon system features many of the combat proven advantages of the military Colt M4. With the 4-position buttstock fully retracted, the Colt Law Enforcement Carbine is less than 30.5 in (77.5 cm) in length and weighs only 7 lb - ideal for tactical deployment and traditional patrol. Colt's Law Enforcement Carbine is available with a step-cut barrel that allows it to accept a grenade launcher for non-lethal options. The mag well reads M4A1 CARBINE with an LE serial number and is also stamped Colt Defense. In the accessories packet there are four rail covers by Knights Armament and they have a plastic pocket carry case, two Colt 30 round magazines, cleaning kit with chamber and bore brushes, sling and manual.

title: For Sale:  R and R Public safety just plain rude
postcontent:
I will not buy anything, and I urge you to do the same, from R and R public safety in Spartanburg, SC! Why? Because they come on armslist practically daily and list 5 pages of ads, bumping existing listings from page 1 to page 5 in an instant. Here's an idea, if you run a business, pay for some advertising and stop screwing up the pages for people who just want to connect with others for private party trades or sales. If you have a special, great, share it with the group, don't list your entire inventory on a site simply because the listings are free. No consideration whatsoever!

title: For Sale:  Blast from the Past - Beretta Mod. 950BS Jetfire in .25 ACP. **FINAL REDUCTION**
postcontent: Beretta Mod. 950BS in .25 ACP. - Private sale of an older classic Beretta in good condition. Made in Italy. When I called Beretta, they advised the gun's serial number predates their record keeping, and that based upon its features it had to have been manufactured sometime between 1950 and 1959. Bore is in excellent shape. I don't think it was shot much. Has a tip up barrel. Perfect gun for someone that is disabled, or has difficulty racking a slide (elderly, those with arthritis, small women etc...). You never rack the slide to shot this gun. You just drop a round in the tip up barrel, and once fired, it automatically cycles the next round. For a “mouse” gun, it has a large 8+1 capacity. Taurus also makes a small caliber tip barrel design, but has a much heavier trigger (due to being double action). The Beretta is only single action, (where the hammer resets due to the blowback from the fired cartridge, and not from pulling the trigger – The trigger only releases the hammer, which equals a light and smooth trigger). Very nice aged look. Nice, and small for concealed carry. Carry it with Hornady “magic” bullets, and it will be just as effective as a 40 caliber. I already have two (2) good shooting .25 acp caliber guns, and can't really justify keeping this one. Own a classic Beretta for only $155 (reduced). Private sale. Must be over 21, have a Florida D/L and be legally able to own a firearm. Sale will must take place at my office in Palm Harbor. Don't waste my time if you are not willing to sign a bill of sale, or won't allow me to make a copy of your Florida d/license. If you want to spend a little less, I am willing to keep the Beretta, and would sell one of my Ravens that is in like new condition (with box), with only about 150 rds through it for $130.00. I never had any type of malfunction/misfire with the Raven.

Shoots 1.5 or smaller groups at 100yds if you do your part. Light weight and short makes it great for hunting. 325 with the scope, 225 without.

Cut down to 20" and recrowned to make the barrel lighter and stiffer, synthetic stock with cheek riser, hard mounted bipod for rigidity, fully floated barrel, picatinny scope mount, smooth, polished single stage trigger instead of the awkward original 2 stage.

Scope is Leapers 3-12x adjustable zoom, illuminated mil-dot reticle, zero locking and zero resetting target turrets, side turret adjustable parallax. Yes, it's a little big for this rifle, but it makes 200yd target shooting a breeze.

I am a hobby gunsmith and professional mechanic. I love turning old rifles into accurate long range target rifles.

title: For Sale:  New Taurus M85 Ultra Light 38 Special +P Revolver Stainless Steel, 5 Shot, Pink Hogue Grip
location: Knightdale, Raleigh / Durham / CH, North Carolina
postcontent:
New Taurus M85 Ultra Light 38 Special +P Revolver Stainless Steel, 5 Shot, Pink Hogue Grip

Full lifetime replacement or repair warranty through Davidsons



Taurus M85 Ultra Light 38 Special +P Revolver Stainless Steel, 5 Shot, Pink Hogue Grip



Ultra-fast. Ultra-reliable. Ultra-lightweight. It's no wonder the 85s are our most popular family. We pack them with a combination of customer-requested features and pair them with the .38 Special +P ammo making them powerful, easy to carry and lightning-quick to use. To many of our friends in Law Enforcement, these are must-have revolvers.

Plus P
Plus P rated for duty use. This firearm is designed to handle high pressure loads under SAAMI specifications.

Taurus Security System (TSS)rs
Taurus family of semi-auto pistols all feature the Taurus Security System, which provides instant-ready defense with built-in ability to secure your pistol and make it inoperable at the turn of a key. When the Security System is engaged, the pistol cannot be fired or cocked and the gun's manual safety cannot be disengaged. As with our revolver Security System, the device is part of the firearm and cannot be lost, and the same special Security Key works for both the revolver and pistol Systems (two keys come with each gun). To engage: simply insert the Key into the button on the rear or side of the pistol and rotate one-quarter turn clockwise. This engages the Security System. The manual safety cannot be moved and the trigger cannot be pulled. To disengage: simply rotate the key one-quarter turn back. This releases the Security System, yet leaves the pistol's manual safety in the "safe" position until you are ready to release it yourself and fire the gun.

Transfer Bar
The transfer bar mechanism prevents the hammer from striking the firing pin unless the trigger is pulled fully to the rear.

Don't expect anyone else to protect your home, property or family in a break-in situation, as the response time for assistance takes too long. I very recently had about $1000 worth of stuff stolen by my garage. I figured I would just call the insurance company and they would take care of my loss. NOPE, The theft deductible is 1% of the value of your home. So if you have a $200,000 home, the 1st $2000 comes out of your pocket, so I got nothing back for my loss. I will tell you that now if someone breaks into my home or steals from me, I will shoot to kill....not shoot to wound. I don't want them coming back later. A shotgun shell is less than 50 cents and that is now my new insurance policy in addition to my homeowners insurance against theft.

title: For Sale:  Concealed Carry Class Utah CFP Oregon CHL
postcontent:
Concealed Carry Class Utah CFP Oregon CHL

Monday October 10, 2014 7:00 PM

Silver Dragon Martial Arts 7881 SW Cirrus Dr Bldg 25D Beaverton OR 97008

Class cost is $65. Save $5 by pre-registering online!

Pre-Register Online: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-10-10-2014-Registration

This class covers everything you need to get your Oregon Concealed Handgun License and your Utah Concealed Firearms Permit. 

Our course exceeds all firearms safety training exceeds the requirements to obtain your Utah CFP, pursuant to Utah Code Title 53 Chapter 5 Section 704, and your Oregon CHL pursuant to ORS 166.291(f)(G). 

Our process starts with issuing you a packet of information, an application for your permit, and fingerprint cards that you will need. We will do your fingerprinting, take your passport photo and make copies of your driver's license before class starts. We do this so that upon completion of this class, you will have a complete packet which you can submit to Utah BCI (Bureau of Criminal Identification) with your payment. You will also have all the information you need to obtain your Oregon CHL from your local Sheriff's department. 

Subjects covered are: Basic Handgun Safety, Tactical Issues, Concealed Carry Firearm selection tips, Ammunition, Holsters, Gun Free Zones, Reciprocity, Cleaning, Storage, Firearm Transport, Justifiable Force, Criminal and Civil liability, How to interact with Law Enforcement, and how to apply for your Permit. 

After attending this class you will have a fundamental understanding about handgun safety and the rights and responsibilities and laws associated with the carrying of a concealed Handgun in multiple states. 

This is NOT a live firing class. Do NOT bring a firearm with you to the class. 

Even though the class time is only scheduled to be 2 1/2 hours long, there will be time for questions and answers after the class. 

More Information: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-10-10-2014-Schedule 
 Download a Flyer: http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/ClassFlyer/utah-cfp-oregon-chl-concealed-carry-class-10-10-2014.pdf 

If you are interested in just the Oregon Concealed Handgun License class visit http://www.keepcalmandcarry.net/oregon-concealed-handgun-license-class-Training_Class

Born of the traditions of the Old West, the Rough Rider maintains much of the look and feel of the legendary Single Action Army revolver, only in a scaled down version. Chambered for the .22LR and .22 Magnum cartridges, the Rough Rider is manufactured using state-of-the-art precision machinery that assures its accuracy and reliability. The cylinder lock-up is tight and the perfect timing of the action makes for a handgun that will put its shots where you want 'em.
The machined barrel is micro-threaded and inserted into the frame for the optimal barrel/cylinder gap to give you maximum ammunition performance. A new, more authentic looking flat-sided hammer paired with new exotic cocobolo grips, makes the Rough Rider both functional and handsome.
